version_description: ・Support for iOS8
Support for iOS9.

The FUJIFILM Camera Remote now can be used to all the wireless-equipped Fujifilm digital cameras*.
It is possible to send as many images as possible (up to 2GB) at once.
Added an auto selection feature to the images which are not yet transferred.
Now it supports X-Pro2, X-E2S, X70, FinePix XP90.
*Above feature varies depending on what camera you use.

Some bug fixes.
The FUJIFILM Camera Remote now can be used to all the wireless-equipped Fujifilm digital cameras*.
*Above feature varies depending on what camera you use.
It is possible to send as many images as possible (up to 2GB) at once.
Added an auto selection feature to the images which are not yet transferred.
Now it supports X-Pro2, X-E2S, X70, FinePix XP90.

Added supported cameras.
Some bug fixes.
Support for iOS10.
Update supported cameras.

Now it supports Bluetooth® and wireless-equipped digitalcameras.
Now it supports X-E3.
*Above feature varies depending on what camera you use.

Now It supports synchronization between "date and time" and/or "location information" of your smartphone or tablet devices with the cameras that offers Bluetooth® capability.
*Above feature varies depending on what camera you use.

・Now it supports firmware update for some cameras that offers Bluetooth® capability via smartphone or tablet devices.
・Now it supports Bluetooth® wireless remote control camera shutter release for some cameras that offers Bluetooth® capability.
*Above feature varies depending on what camera you use.

Compatible with instax mini Link.
Bug Fixes and performance improvements.
*Above feature varies depending on the camera you use.

Now it supports GFX100.
Bug Fixes and performance improvements.
*Above feature varies depending on what camera you use.

Now it supports X-T3.
*Above feature varies depending on what camera you use.

・New design and improved usability
・Updates of supported cameras.
・Bug Fixes and performance improvements.
*Above feature varies depending on what camera you use.
